attributes.action: MAKE IST JULY 2016 A PUBLIC HOLIDAY
attributes.additional_details: I WOULD LIKE TO PETITION FOR IST JULY 2016 TO BE MADE A PUBLIC HOLIDAY FOR THAT YEAR ONLY. THIS WILL ENABLE COMMEMORATIONS IN REMEMBRANCE OF IST JULY 1914, WHEN THE BRITISH ARMY LOST MORE MEN IN A SINGLE DAY BEFORE OR SINCE, TO TAKE PLACE EXACTLY 100 YEARS TO THE DAY.  I WOULD ALSO LIKE TO ADD THAT ALL SHOPS TO BE CLOSED TILL 12AM ON THAT DAY.
